patthana16.49:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.49:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
